titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 1106) to prevent mortgage foreclosures and enhance mortgage credit availability.
Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 1106) to prevent mortgage foreclosures and enhance mortgage credit availability.

action.text: The resolution provides that amendment number 1 printed in House Report 111-21 to be offered by Rep. John Conyers or his designee shall be perfected by the modification printed in the report to accompany this resolution.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-23, by Mr. Hastings (FL).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 14.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 205.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 239 - 181, 1 Present (Roll no. 97).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 1106) to prevent mortgage foreclosures and enhance mortgage credit availability.
